entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Norfolk
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:31 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.8°C

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Amount 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 60 km/h gusting to 100. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie. Local blowing snow. Amount 15 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries ending late in the evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls near Lake Erie in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:32 PM EST Friday 23 December 2022
